What is your political ideology?
Your Result: Anarchist
 
84%
Anarchists seek to remove all unnecessary hierarchy and live in a society with no rulers. They are a diverse group, ranging from communists to capitalists to even some primitivists!

马克思按理说应该没那么高，问卷很多问题太片面了，自娱自乐就行了。不过安娜其主义者总算是和我预想的不错。
